label: Campos, Martha R. & Célio Magalhães.  2014. Colombiathelphusa, a new genus of freshwater crab from Colombia, and the first location record of Eidocamptophallus chacei (Pretzmann, 1967) (Crustacea: Decapoda: Pseudothelphusidae). Zootaxa 3860(6): 571–579.
